title: PrEP: The pill that stops you contracting HIV
content: This video can not be playedStigma around HIV is still a big problem in Scotland. It can prevent people taking sexual health tests or getting treatment following a positive diagnosis, according to a leading charity.Timeline's, David MacNicol spoke to three men from Glasgow about how they are using PrEP, Pre-exposure prophylaxis, to take control of their sexual health.
